description: The idealistic leader of the AEUG, who travels aboard the Argama during its initial tour of duty. Formerly a high-ranking officer in the Earth Federation Forces, Blex was outraged by the atrocities of the Titans, and used his political and business connections to organize a resistance group. Well-acquainted with his enemies Bask Om and Jamitov Hymem, Blex plots his counter-strategies against them with the calm intelligence of a veteran chess player.
name: Blex Forer
